ProjectTitle: Catalytic conversion of ethylene and CO2 in supercritical conditions
InitialFeedbackHistory:
21/02/2025
Please note that the questions in your DMP are missing, when downloading a DMP from DMPonline.be please check the boxes "question text and section headings" and "unanswered questions" to get a complete DMP. 
Storage/preservation: Please note that the ICTS recommends against using OneDrive, Box or external hard drives for the storage of research data. Upon your departure from KU Leuven, your OneDrive and Box account will be closed, resulting in the loss of any data stored there. You can find solutions recommended by ICTS in the storage guide: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en. Also note that the KU Leuven policy asks for 10 years of data preservation: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing: will you share data via a trusted data repository, for example RDR (https://rdr.kuleuven.be/)? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
